entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:53 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 2:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
Temperature: -14.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -16.8°C
Wind: E 88 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 30 km/h except 80 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 30 km/h except 80 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h except 60 near the Richardson mountains in the morning. Wind becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
